subject: Dear Hello,
body:
Dear Hello,
I need you as an Overseas Partner in a financial transaction worth. (US$11,745,358.00) if you have a Personal Bank Account and not Company's Bank Account.  A Bank Account that only you control.  This amount is not from illegal funds (drug funds, money laundering funds, illegal firearms funds, illegal gambling funds) but from an
Over-invoicing of a (Contract Projects) already completed and full payment made to the Original Contractor leaving out this. (US$11,745,358.00) which we are seeking for your cooperation shall be legally remitted into that Bank Account for our mutual benefits.  My colleagues and I have agreed to give you 35% of the total amount at
the conclusion of the transaction within (7) days.
The process is that you will act as our Overseas Partner, we shall, process and remit first $500,000.00 into that Bank Account to test your loyalty and trustworthiness.  If you do not (sit tight) on the remitted $500,000.00 then the balance will be remitted immediately.
Write back if you are interested on this email: 
ra4278741@gmail.com
Regards,
Kaori ICHIKAWA.

subject: Re: Dear Hello,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out with this opportunity. Can you provide more details about the Contract Projects that have been completed and how my involvement as an Overseas Partner would work? I'm interested in learning more about the process and how we can proceed.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Dear Hello,
body:
Dear Sir,

Your email reply received.

This amount is not from illegal funds (drug funds, money laundering funds,
illegal firearms funds, illegal gambling funds) but from an Over-invoicing
of a Government Projects already completed and full payment made to the
Original Contractor leaving out this (US$11,745,358.00) which we are
seeking for your cooperation shall be
legally remitted into that Bank Account for our mutual benefits.

The Process is very simple, send to me your Personal Bank Account
details,Full name, Address, Phone and copy of ID then our personnel will do
the necessary documentation to present you as the Funds Owner/Funds
Beneficiary.

Then, approvals/remittance schedule batch will be obtained.  The
with-holding Bank will now communicate to you directly as the Funds
Owner/Funds Beneficiary.

Note:  The sum of $500,000.00 shall be remitted firstly to your bank account

Write back if you are interested.
Regards,
Mrs. Kaori ICHIKAWA.

subject: Re: Dear Hello,
body:
Hello,
Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your transparency regarding the source of the funds. Can you provide more details about the Government Projects that were completed and led to this payment? I am interested in learning more about how this process works.

Best wishes,
Marie
